label: 平治の乱
本: The Cambridge History of Japan, Volume 2:  Heian Japan . Cambridge University Press . 1999
説明文: The conflict in 1159 in which the anti-Shinzei and anti-insei faction among the nobles (the Fujiwara courtiers Tsunemune, Nobuyori, and Korekata) were joined by the disaffected Minamoto warrior chieftain Yoshitomo, a bitter enemy of his military rival, Taira no Kiyomori, and of Shinzei, to contemplate a coup to topple Shinzei and Kiyomori.  Although the plotters managed to kill Shinzei, the rebellion ended with the victory of Kiyomori's troops (p. 622). [,藤原信西、藤原信頼、源義朝、平清盛]
